summary: This page is dedicated to resources related to managers, providing valuable insights and knowledge for individuals in managerial roles. It includes profiles of experts who share their experiences, insights, and advice on effective management practices. Currently featured is Jan Hein Hoogstad, an entrepreneur and ecosystem architect, who emphasizes open knowledge sharing and impactful internet use.
excerpt: Explore valuable insights from Jan Hein Hoogstad, an entrepreneur and ecosystem architect, who shares his vision on creating ecosystems centered on open knowledge sharing and impactful internet use.
